# dist — runnable package

Everything needed to run the Garvan demo.

**Contents:**
- `qseries.exe` — q-series REPL binary (built by `make`)
- `demo/garvan-demo.sh` — demo script
- `demo/README.md` — demo instructions

**Run the demo:**
```bash
./demo/garvan-demo.sh
```
(Requires `qseries.exe` in this folder.)
